name: A HAPPENING AT THE WOODS
description:
A HAPPENING AT THE WOODS is a contemporary installation art.

Four huge, minimalistic steel sculptures placed in a small foggy woods under the moonlight.

From a central platform, electronic music synced with light projections creates psychedelic patterns on the geometry.

you can walk around the place and go inside the sculptures for interesting viewing angles.

Enjoy the music, explore the sculptures angles and look at your surroundings... 
Playing time: Approx. 15 minutes. Experience is in a loop.
Press ESC to quit.

Other ways to support us is to get your own awesome T-shirts and Wall Art posters here: https://society6.com/gigoiastudios

ORIGINAL PAINTINGS FOR SALE:  https://www.etsy.com/shop/ArtMonteiro

Recommended  hardware  requirements:  
Processor: 1,4 GHz Intel Core i5 
Memory: 8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3 
Graphics:  Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or better
